channel.title: .Net on .Net Programmer Incubator
channel.description: Recent content in .Net on .Net Programmer Incubator

item.title: The First Appliction in Asp.Net Core
item.description: Create a new project Open Visual Studio and click on “Create a new project” from the start menu. Select the “ASP.NET Core Web App” template and click “Next”. Enter a name for your project and click “Next”. Select the “.NET 7.0(Standard Term Support)” or latest version framework and clic “Create”. The project is created and the “Solution Explorer” window is displayed. Write “Hello World” in the “Index.cshtml” file and debug the project.
